title: New HIGH TECH Coffee maker at home! Spinn Coffee Review!
description: PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -   AUDIO:  Sennheiser AVX Digital Wireless -  Sony XLR Adapter -  Sony Hot Shoe Shotgun -  Tiny Sony Microphone -  DJI Mics -  Rode Podcaster Pro II -  Podcaster Mic -  Elgato Wave 3 Mic -   DRONES: DJI Mavic 3 -  DJI Mini 3 -  DJI Air 2S -   LIGHTING: Aputure 600d Pro -  Aputure Light Dome II -  Aputure Amaran 200d -  Aputure 35in Light Dome -  Aputure Lantern Softbox -   Sony CF Express A 160g + Card Reader-  Sony CF Express A 800g -     These links are affiliate and by using them youre helping out my channel! Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: - Today we're checking out a brand new coffee maker, this makes coffee in an all new way. It's called Spinn. (upbeat music) This is something that has been in development for many years. It started out as a Kickstarter and now over five years later, it is finally shipping to customers. And what's exciting about this is they have perfected an all new way of making coffee. Let's check it out and I'll show you guys why this is so unique. This has an accompanying app. So in the app, not only can I decide what type of coffee I wanna make, but it also has a marketplace. Right now this coffee marketplace has over 1500 different bags of coffee from over 450 local roasters. This allows you to set up subscription. There's also a little quiz that will ask you what type of coffee you like. And then those beans will be automatically shipped to you if you choose to have a subscription. And also, even if you don't have this machine, you guys can still have access to the marketplace to order really great coffee. I have a few of these here that I've ordered already. There's another thing that makes the app really cool. This has coffee bean recognition. So when you take a picture of the front of the coffee, it will be able to find this in the marketplace. And it will also be able to link it up to your app so that the coffee machine knows the type of coffee that you're about to make. And it will use different algorithms to grind the beans a different way, use different temperatures of water, all of those things are determined in advance by the roasters, so the type of coffee that this will make is exactly what they had in mind. Now it's time to make some coffee. First, I'm gonna make an espresso and we're gonna use these beans because I already opened these ones. Oh, smells some good. Honestly, there's nothing better than just smelling fresh coffee beans. Another thing that's important when you're making good coffee is having good filtered water. So a built in filter. Let's fill it out. (water running) That's it. Now it's giving me the option to choose my coffee and we already have our Blueprint Seasonal House Coffee already in here, so I'm gonna click select. This little reservoir is great because you can just keep the beans in here. They're ready to go. And it doesn't grind it until you're ready to make an espresso or a coffee. Right now it's time for espresso. I already know it's gonna be good because I've already made one before. But we're gonna make one here for you guys. Are you ready? I'm ready. Espresso. Go. Why this is called Spinn is because the beans are actually spinning inside of this machine. Instead of being pressed down. (machine rumbles) Smells so good. (gasps) My entire house now just smells like a coffee shop. So it goes through this whole process, it makes your espresso and it also cleans the machine at the same time. So it's forcing those grinds into this little area right down here. It makes it super easy to clean. We don't need to talk about cleaning right now. We're talking about espresso. (sniffs coffee) (upbeat music) I mean, it looks perfect, but how does it taste? (upbeat music) It's so smooth. I've tried a lot of coffee from so many different types of machines like this and what makes this so good is the fact that these beans are being ground right here and they're so fresh. And this is so smooth. (sips coffee) I'm gonna be so hyped up, (giggles) so good. What would you like? - [Tyler] Let's do a coffee. - I'll make a coffee. Tyler has ordered a coffee, here at the barista bar of my kitchen. That guy here, there you go. So this is great because if you do want a cup of coffee, that's a little bit stronger, you have that option. We're just gonna stick to the basics. Let's click make drink, it's for your Tyler. (upbeat music) (machine rumbles) Tyler's coffee's ready. There you go. There you go. There you go. It's really hot, you might wanna wait a second. So you don't have to worry about these being like all gross. - It's- - All dried. - So dry. - Dump it out, rinse it out and you're done. Well this is the first look at the Spinn coffee maker. I'm such a huge fan of this and I cannot wait to make more coffee. One of the things to note is if you do order it now, they do have a backlog of pre-orders that they have to ship out first. So if you do order it now, you wouldn't get one until later on this year. But either way, this is so exciting and a huge step forward for making coffee at home. Thank you guys so much for watching.
